sections.heading: Title.
sections.text:
This Act shall be known and may be cited as the "Small
Business Utility Deposit Relief Act".

sections.heading: Definitions.
sections.text: For the purposes of this Act:

sections.heading: Utility Deposits required of Small Businesses.
sections.text:
No utility
supplier which provides utility service shall request a deposit from any
small business, for any reason, in excess of 1/6 of the estimated annual
charges for service for that small business computed at the net rate for
that class of service.

sections.heading: Refunds of Small Business Utility Deposits.
sections.text:
Deposits plus
interest shall be automatically refunded to the payor after being held for
12 months according to the following:

sections.heading: Interest Paid on Small Business Utility Deposits.
sections.text:
All utilities
shall pay interest on any and all deposits held by the utility on behalf
of a small business. The rate of interest to be paid on such deposits
will be determined by the Commission.

sections.heading: Record of Utility Deposit.
sections.text:
A utility shall maintain records of
deposits together with interest, which collectively will show all transactions
pertaining to each deposit. A utility shall provide the applicant with
a Certificate of Deposit for any deposit received. The Certificate shall
show the applicant's name, service address, serial number, type of service,
amount of deposit, rate of interest on deposit, date received, utility's
name and a statement of the conditions under which the deposit will be refunded
to the applicant. Nothing in this Act shall require a utility to accept
deposits from third parties on behalf of an applicant.

sections.heading: Nothing in this Act shall affect in any way the current or
sections.text:
future Commission policy, rule, or order governing deposits collected from
residential utility users by a utility.

sections.heading: The Commission shall administer this Act and is authorized
sections.text:
to promulgate rules or issue orders it deems necessary for the administration
of this Act.

sections.heading: Effective date.
sections.text:
This Act shall take effect upon its becoming
law and shall apply to all utility deposits collected from small businesses
after the effective date of this Act.
